entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character in the story, who is on a mission with Luna.

entities.name: luna
entities.description: A person accompanying Harry on his mission.

entities.name: invisibility cloak
entities.description: An object that allows Harry and Luna to become invisible.

entities.name: marauder's map
entities.description: A magical map that helps Harry locate himself and others in the castle.

entities.name: filch
entities.description: A person who is moving away from Harry and Luna.

entities.name: castle
entities.description: The location where the story takes place.

relationships.description: Harry and Luna are on a mission together.
Harry uses the Invisibility Cloak to become invisible with Luna.
Harry uses the Marauder's Map to locate himself and others in the castle.
Harry and Luna are trying to avoid Filch.
Harry is navigating through the castle with Luna.
